column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Male Fire Nation soldier says : " I do n't know .
#Text=She 's coming .
#Text=" Mung says : " There is no Painted Lady !
#Text=" Female Fire Nation soldier says : " What is that sound ?
#Text=" Male Fire Nation soldier says : " Maybe it is her .
#Text=" Mung says : " Do something !
#Text=Stand your ground !
#Text=I 'll take care of you myself .
#Text=" Katara says : " Leave this village and never come back .
#Text=" Little boy says : " I knew you 'd come .
#Text=" Villager # 1 says : " Thank you !
#Text=" Villager # 2 says : " Painted Lady , you 're the best !
#Text=" Dock says : " Me and my brothers really owe you a lot .
#Text=Hey , wait a minute !
#Text=I know you !
#Text=You 're not the Painted Lady , you 're that colonial girl !
#Text=" Little boy says : " Yeah , you 're the lady that gave me a fish .
#Text=" Dock says : " You 've been tricking us .
#Text=You 're a waterbender !
#Text=" Villager # 3 says : " She 's a waterbender !
#Text=" Villager # 4 says : " How dare you act like our Painted Lady !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe she is a waterbender , but she was just trying to help you .
#Text=Because of her , that factory wo n't be polluting your river , and the army is gone .
#Text=You should be down on your knees thanking her !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , it 's okay .
#Text=I should n't have acted like someone I was n't , and I should n't have tricked you .
#Text=But I felt like I had to do something .
#Text=It does n't matter if the Painted Lady is real or not .
#Text=Because your problems are real , and this river is real .
#Text=You ca n't wait around for someone to help you .
#Text=You have to help yourself .
#Text=" Dock says : " She 's right , but what should we do ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Maybe we can clean the river !
#Text=" Dock says : " Yeah , we can clean the river !
#Text=Thank you .
#Text=You know , you 're not so bad for a waterbender .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You would n't mind keeping that a secret , by the way , would you ?
#Text=" Dock says : " No problem .
#Text=Keeping my mouth shut is a personal specialty .
#Text=My brother Xu , on the other hand , ohh , he 's a blabbermouth .
#Text=" Katara says : " So , Dock , are you gon na help us clean ?
#Text=" Dock says : " No , ma'am .
#Text=I 'm going to get my other brother , Bushi .
#Text=He loves cleaning rivers .
#Text=All right , I 'm Bushi !
#Text=Let 's get some river cleaning done !
#Text=" Aang says : " Aha , I knew it !
#Text=I knew you were the same guy .
#Text=You 're the shop owner and the boat guy .
#Text=" Dock says : " Oh , you must be talking about my brothers , Dock and Xu .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I just saw you !
#Text=You switched hats and called yourself a different name !
#Text=" Dock says : " Oh , you know who does that ?
#Text=My brother , Dock .
#Text=He 's crazy .
#Text=" Painted Lady says : " Thank you .

#Text=" Main Aang Katara Sokka Toph Antagonists Fire Nation guards Mung says : " Minor Appa Dock / Xu / Bushi Jang Hui boy Momo Painted Lady " Zuko says : " I know you 're nervous , but remember , firebending in it of itself is not something to fear .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay .
#Text=Not something to fear .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But if you do n't respect it , it 'll chew you up and spit you out like an angry komodo rhino !
#Text="
